text: Ancistrocladus letestui is a species of liana of the plant family of the Ancistrocladaceae occurring in the subtropical or tropical dry forests of Cameroon, Congo-Brazzaville, Zaire, and Gabon. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==External links== * View occurrences of Ancistrocladus letestui in the Biodiversity Heritage Library. title: Ancistrocladus letestui
